import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;


public class Main {

	public static void main(String[] args) { 

		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		String str;
		try {
			str = br.readLine();
			int numCases = Integer.parseInt(str);

			while(numCases>0) {

				int board[][] = new int[4][4];
				for(int i=0; i<4; ++i){
					StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(br.readLine());
					board[i][0] = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
					board[i][1] = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
					board[i][2] = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
					board[i][3] = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
				}

				int s1 = board[0][0] + board[0][2] + board[1][1] + board[1][3] 
				                                                            + board[2][0] + board[2][2] + board[3][1] + board[3][3];
				int s2 = board[0][1] + board[0][3] + board[1][0] + board[1][2]
				                                                            + board[2][1] + board[2][3] + board[3][0] + board[3][2];
				if(s1>s2)
					System.out.println((s1-s2));
				else
					System.out.println((s2-s1));
				br.readLine();
				numCases--;
			}
		} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
}
